title: The Diamond Heist
overview: In a certain county, Zhang Hao and Wu Erwo took risks because of Coca-Cola's high surgery fee, and armed themselves to rob a gold store. Just when the two brothers hesitated, another group of robbers took the lead and robbed the cash transport truck passing by the gold store. In the chaos, the robbers mistook Zhang Hao and Zhang Hao for their accomplices and threw a bag of priceless diamonds to them. He accidentally got involved in a real diamond robbery.
